title: Compiler bug with rustc 1.3.0-nightly (e4e93196e 2015-07-14)

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
Got the following with `rustc 1.3.0-nightly (e4e93196e 2015-07-14)`:

```
thread 'rustc' panicked at 'index out of bounds: the len is 92 but the index is 530', ../src/libcollections/vec.rs:1376
```
